|ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8019AS;RTL8019AS, 04354A1, 018F TAIWAN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 10MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = PCMCIA (16-bit) |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = 1 |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, DE-9 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = b |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = WLAN |defaultssid_regex = ^WLAN$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenAP |availability = OEM |fccapprovdate = 10/31/2000 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Eumitcom WL11000-2 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861; |rad1chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-TNC |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The AP has been resold under the following brands and names..
*[[Addtron AWS-100]] *[[Cheetah WB3001A]] [http://lists.contesting.com/archives/html/Karlnet/2003-06/msg00005.html] *[[Netcomm NP2000AP]] ([http://web.archive.org/web/200101072118/http://www.netcomm.com.au/products/19.htm Archived product page]) *[[SMC SMC2652W]] ([http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=downloads.doSearchCriteria&localeCode=EN_USA&knowsPartNumber=false&productCategory=5&modelNumber=451&partNumber=2173&downloadType=0&os=0 Downloads]), OUI 00:90:D1 (Ethernet or WLAN?) *[[SMC SMC2682W]] (bridge, [http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=downloads.searchResults&localeCode=EN_USA&productCategory=94&partNumber=1737&modelNumber=507&knowsPartNumber=false&userPartNumber= Downloads]) [http://lists.contesting.com/archives/html/Karlnet/2003-06/msg00005.html] *[[USRobotics USR2450]] ([http://www.usr.com/support/product-template.asp?prod=2450 Product page]) These devices could run [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OpenAP OpenAP] ([http://www.seattlewireless.net/OpenAP Seattle Wireless]), an open source firmware (the first) released by Instant802 Networks. The OpenAP website was originally http://opensource.instant802.com , then changed to http://opensource.devicescape.com/ , now defunct. [http://www.teletronics.com/11MAP.pdf Manual] on Teletronics' website, [http://www.bizarnet.ro/download/wireless/WL2411SA-N/WL2411SA-N_bridge_manual.pdf Bridge manual] on bizarnet.ro Default password from Eumitcom may be "WLAN_AP" for access point models and "WLAN_BRIDGE" for bridge models. Username may be "default" or "Default" (USR2450 manual specifies this one). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.wiresncode.com/projects/wireless/openap/ OpenAP Hardware Hacking] t'was on Guerilla.net (RIP).. kindly archived by [http://www.jaffa.it/mirrors/guerrilla.net/reference/openAP/index.html jaffa.it] ==Pictures==
